abstract: Jeff Urwin, a Bear Stearns veteran and a co-head of JPMorgan Chase’s North American investment banking operations, will assume a more global role, according to an internal memo.
snippet: Jeff Urwin, a Bear Stearns veteran and a co-head of JPMorgan Chase’s North American investment banking operations, will assume a more global role, according to an internal memo.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase on Wednesday promoted Jeff Urwin, one of its co-heads of North American investment banking, to a global role, according to an internal memorandum obtained by DealBook.

headline.main: JPMorgan Gives Top North American Banker a Global Role

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
